thread.title: BREAKING NEWS: 'Explosion on Paris Metro' – dozens of passengers evacuated from station
thread.title_full: BREAKING NEWS: 'Explosion on Paris Metro' – dozens of passengers evacuated from station

title: BREAKING NEWS: 'Explosion on Paris Metro' – dozens of passengers evacuated from station
text:
BREAKING NEWS: 'Explosion on Paris Metro' – dozens of passengers evacuated from station BREAKING NEWS: 'Explosion on Paris Metro' – dozens of passengers evacuated from station DOZENS of passengers have been evacuated from a Paris metro station after a "huge explosion" this evening. PUBLISHED: 21:45, Wed, Feb 8, 2017 | UPDATED: 22:08, Wed, Feb 8, 2017 TWITTER A huge explosion was reported on the Paris metro this evening 
The incident happened close to the the Place d'Italie subway stop at around 9.30pm local time, according to reports. 
Eight people are said to have been injured in the apparent blast, which appears to have been caused by an electrical fire. 
Security personnel have sealed off the area. Related articles
